Package stocks.controller

Interface Features

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuiController
    public interface Features
    Interface for all the features that the controller can perform on the model. View can add these features as action listeners to user actions on the GUI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void buyMultipleStock​(java.lang.String tickerList, java.lang.String weightList, java.lang.String date, double total, double commission, boolean show)
      Allows the user to bulk purchase multiple stocks in a single transaction on a specific date.
      void buyStock​(java.lang.String ticker, double quantity, java.lang.String date, double commission, boolean show)
      Buys a stock in the Flexible portfolio that the user is currently interacting with.
      void createPortfolio​(java.lang.String portfolioName)
      Creates a flexible portfolio with the user provided portfolio name.
      void createPortfolioWithSip​(java.lang.String tickerList, java.lang.String weightList, java.lang.String startDate, java.lang.String endDate, int interval, double total, double commission)
      Allows the user to create a portfolio with a basket of stocks and periodically invest in the basket of stocks.
      void createUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Creates a new user and the corresponding folder in the local storage to store user's portfolios.

    • Method Detail

      • createUser

        void createUser​(java.lang.String username)
        Creates a new user and the corresponding folder in the local storage to store user's portfolios.
        Parameters:
        username - Underscore-separated username provided by the user.

      • loginUser

        void loginUser​(java.lang.String username)
        Logs in an existing user.
        Parameters:
        username - Underscore-separated username provided by the user.

      • createPortfolio

        void createPortfolio​(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Creates a flexible portfolio with the user provided portfolio name.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - Underscore-separated name of the portfolio.

      • goToScreen

        void goToScreen​(GuiView screen)
        Displays a new GUI screen to the user. Moves control from one screen to the other.
        Parameters:
        screen - Object of the new screen to be shown to the user.

      • writePortfolio

        void writePortfolio()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a portfolio as a xml file to the local storage.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an unsuccessful file write happens.

      • buyStock

        void buyStock​(java.lang.String ticker,
              double quantity,
              java.lang.String date,
              double commission,
              boolean show)
        Buys a stock in the Flexible portfolio that the user is currently interacting with.
        Parameters:
        ticker - Stock ticker to be purchased.
        quantity - Quantity of the stock to be purchased.
        date - Date of Purchase of the stock.
        commission - Commission for the transaction.
        show - Toggle between displaying a popup confirmation to user or not.

      • sellStock

        void sellStock​(java.lang.String ticker,
               double quantity,
               java.lang.String date,
               double commission)
        Sells a stock in the Flexible portfolio that the user is currently interacting with.
        Parameters:
        ticker - Stock ticker to be purchased.
        quantity - Quantity of the stock to be purchased.
        date - Date of Purchase of the stock.
        commission - Commission for the transaction.

      • getUserPortfolios

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> getUserPortfolios()
        Get a list of portfolios in the user account.
        Returns:
        List of current user's portfolio names.

      • showComposition

        void showComposition​(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Displays the portfolio composition to the user.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - Underscore-separated name of the portfolio.

      • showValuation

        void showValuation​(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                   java.lang.String date)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Displays the portfolio valuation to the user on a specific date.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - Underscore-separated name of the portfolio.
        date - Date for which the valuation is calculated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the price data for the ticker doesn't exist.

      • showCostBasis

        void showCostBasis​(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                   java.lang.String date)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Displays the cost-basis of the portfolio to the user on a specific date.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - Underscore-separated name of the portfolio.
        date - Date for which the cost-basis is calculated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when the price data for the ticker doesn't exist.

      • showPerformance

        void showPerformance​(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                     java.lang.String startDate,
                     java.lang.String endDate)
        Displays the performance of the portfolio to the user for a specific date range.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - Underscore-separated name of the portfolio.
        startDate - Start date for the portfolio performance.
        endDate - End date for the portfolio performance.

      • editPortfolio

        void editPortfolio​(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Edits the portfolio that the user is currently interacting with. User can buy more stocks or sell existing stocks in the portfolio.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - Underscore-separated name of the portfolio.

      • loadPortfolio

        void loadPortfolio​(java.lang.String path)
        Loads an existing user's portfolio into the Model.
        Parameters:
        path - File path of the portfolio in local storage.

      • buyMultipleStock

        void buyMultipleStock​(java.lang.String tickerList,
                      java.lang.String weightList,
                      java.lang.String date,
                      double total,
                      double commission,
                      boolean show)
        Allows the user to bulk purchase multiple stocks in a single transaction on a specific date.
        Parameters:
        tickerList - Stock ticker list to be purchased.
        weightList - Weight distribution of the stocks to be purchased that sum upto 100%.
        date - Date of Purchase of the stock.
        total - The total amount for which the transaction is executed.
        commission - Commission for the transaction.
        show - Toggle between displaying a popup confirmation to user or not.

      • createPortfolioWithSip

        void createPortfolioWithSip​(java.lang.String tickerList,
                            java.lang.String weightList,
                            java.lang.String startDate,
                            java.lang.String endDate,
                            int interval,
                            double total,
                            double commission)
        Allows the user to create a portfolio with a basket of stocks and periodically invest in the basket of stocks.
        Parameters:
        tickerList - Stock ticker list to be purchased.
        weightList - Weight distribution of the stocks to be purchased that sum upto 100%.
        startDate - Start date for the SIP to execute.
        endDate - (Optional) End date for the SIP to terminate.
        interval - Frequency of execution of the SIP
        total - he total amount for which the SIP is executed.
        commission - Commission for the SIP execution.
